name: Pisco Sour
description: The Pisco Sour is a cocktail of Peruvian origin that uses pisco as the base liquor and lemon or lime juice for the sour component.
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Combine the egg white, Pisco, simple syrup and lemon/lime juice.
Cover and shake vigorously for 15 seconds.
Strain the contents into a 6-ounce cocktail glass.
Top with a few drops of bitters.
